answers.answer: Hun that's nothing to worry about. I gain 50 lbs with all my pregnancies. Your so lucky.

You're kinding, right?! I'm 30 weeks 3 days and as of last week I've gained 25lbs and have gestational diabetes, which means limiting my white carbs and sugars. I'm more concerned that I'm gaining too much and I will have a 9+lb baby. It sounds like you are right on target and you should have nothing to worry about
I'm 22 weeks and have gained 20lbs so far

At 30 weeks I had gained 15lbs. The app tells you the range you should be in. It's based on your original weight and height. If you were obese to begin with then yes, you have gained too much. If you were really underweight to begin with or had an eating disorder then you haven't gained enough.
I was average weight bc before I got pregnant I lost almost 75 pounds.
Then I'd say you are doing great with your weight gain. :)

question: I'm 30 weeks and I have gained 17lbs total is that to much???
title: good or bad
